FuncDef: The reset xpl-filter counters command clears statistics about the routes matching a specified route-filter.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a route-filter.
The value is a string of 1 to 200 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To re-collect the statistics about the routes matching a route-filter, run the reset xpl-filter counters command to clear existing statistics about the routes matching the route-filter.
